org.grouplens.lenskit.cli

Interface Command

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Eval, GlobalRecommend, Graph, PackRatings, Predict, Recommend, TrainModel, Version

    public interface Command
    Interface implemented by all CLI subcommands.

    In addition to implementing this interface, a subcommand must be annotated with CommandSpec to declare its name and help text, and have a static method configureArguments(ArgumentParser) that registers the subcommand's arguments and options with the provided argument parser.

    Since:
    2.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Execute the command.

        Execute the command.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs in the command.
